items.name: Testimonial
items.description: A Testimonial contains a user's photo, a short bio, and their testimonial about the service

validations.message: The Short Bio is intended to be short.  Please keep it under 100 characters.
Please limit the Testimonial to no more than 400 characters

items.name: Menu
items.description:
A Menu contains a number of Menu Buttons or other Menus, grouped together horizontally or vertically.

If a Menu contains another Menu, the contained menu will become a drop-down.

The optional 'Hamburger' field is rendered as the hamburger button on the right side of the menu, and opens as a drop-down.

validations.message: The Menu groups must contain only sub-Menus or MenuButtons

items.name: Dropdown Menu
items.description: A Dropdown Menu can be attached to a main menu to show additional menu items on click.

items.name: Section: Video Highlight
items.description: The Video Highlight section includes a player for Youtube videos.

items.name: Homepage
items.description: The Homepage is a special page - it contains some fields like the Top Menu and Site Footer which are set on all other Pages.  This page is visible at the root of watermarkresources.org

validations.message: Favicons are supposed to be small.  Please use an image less than 100kb in size.

items.name: Theme
items.description: A Theme can be applied to a section to give it a certain style, for example by changing colors or positioning certain elements

validations.message: This must be a valid CSS color.  Reference: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/color_value
This must be a valid CSS color.  Reference: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/color_value
This must be a valid CSS color.  Reference: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/color_value
This must be a valid CSS color.  Reference: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/color_value

items.name: Section: Card Search
items.description: A group of cards & search functionality for those cards

items.name: Ministry
items.description: Represents a ministry shown on the Ministry Gallery page.

items.name: Page
items.description:
Represents one page on the site.  

There is a Homepage, a Ministry Gallery, one page per ministry, and a variety of other pages.

validations.message: The slug must look like the path part of a URL and begin with a forward slash, example: '/my-page-slug'

items.name: Ministry/Conference Card
items.description: A card displaying a Ministry or Conference.  Links to a page.

items.name: Section: FAQ
items.description: (v2) A section containing a number of expandable frequently asked questions

items.name: Section: Testimonials
items.description: The Testimonials section shows a set of testimonials with associated photo and text.

items.name: Menu Button
items.description: A Menu Button is a clickable button that goes on a Menu.  It has a link to a path or a URL.

validations.message: a MenuButton's text field should be very short - ideally a single word.  Please limit the text to 60 characters or less.
The icon should be the name of a FontAwesome icon - example: 'fa-accessible-icon' which is this one: https://fontawesome.com/icons/accessible-icon
Each line must be a CSS rule, like 'background-color: blue;' 'width: 50% !important;' or 'border-color: rgba(91, 120, 05, .8);'.  Did you forget a semilcolon at the end?  Or a colon in the middle?
The external link must be a URL like 'https://www.watermark.org/'
The Link must be a link to a Page which has a Slug.  Example: '/ministries'
If provided, this will link the user to the specific section on a page.  You must use this in combination with Page Link.
The slug can only contain lower case letters, numbers, underscores and dashes.
